QueryDefinition.Query:
with a as ( SELECT distinct isnull(hosp_nis, hospid) as hospid, hospst, CASE WHEN hospstco = -9999 THEN NULL ELSE hospstco END as hospstco FROM {sc}.core where hospid is not null or hosp_nis is not null )
SELECT distinct hospid, cast( CASE SUBSTRING(hospst, 1, 1) WHEN 'A' THEN '1' WHEN 'B' THEN '2' WHEN 'C' THEN '3' WHEN 'D' THEN '4' WHEN 'E' THEN '5' WHEN 'F' THEN '6' WHEN 'G' THEN '7' WHEN 'H' THEN '8' WHEN 'I' THEN '9' WHEN 'K' THEN '10' WHEN 'L' THEN '11' WHEN 'M' THEN '12' WHEN 'N' THEN '13' WHEN 'O' THEN '14' WHEN 'P' THEN '15' WHEN 'Q' THEN '16' WHEN 'R' THEN '17' WHEN 'S' THEN '18' WHEN 'T' THEN '19' WHEN 'V' THEN '20' WHEN 'X' THEN '21' WHEN 'Y' THEN '22' WHEN 'Z' THEN '23' ELSE '999' END + CASE SUBSTRING(hospst, 2, 1) WHEN 'A' THEN '1' WHEN 'B' THEN '2' WHEN 'C' THEN '3' WHEN 'D' THEN '4' WHEN 'E' THEN '5' WHEN 'F' THEN '6' WHEN 'G' THEN '7' WHEN 'H' THEN '8' WHEN 'I' THEN '9' WHEN 'K' THEN '10' WHEN 'L' THEN '11' WHEN 'M' THEN '12' WHEN 'N' THEN '13' WHEN 'O' THEN '14' WHEN 'P' THEN '15' WHEN 'Q' THEN '16' WHEN 'R' THEN '17' WHEN 'S' THEN '18' WHEN 'T' THEN '19' WHEN 'V' THEN '20' WHEN 'X' THEN '21' WHEN 'Y' THEN '22' WHEN 'Z' THEN '23' ELSE '999' END + cast(ISNULL(hospstco, '0') as varchar) as bigint) as location_id, 9201 as PlaceOfSvcConceptId FROM a
